meanings.definition: Payment made for the use of property or land
meanings.sent1: She pays her rents on time every month.
meanings.sent2: The landlord collected the rents from all the tenants.
meanings.sent3: The rents for the apartment were so high, it felt like paying for a castle!
meanings.sent4: The community thrived on the rents paid by its members.
meanings.sent5: The colorful houses stood as a testament to the rents paid for their beauty.

meanings.sent1: She noticed a small rents in her favorite dress.
meanings.sent2: The rents in the curtains let the sunlight filter through.
meanings.sent3: The rents in his shirt made it look like a fashionable design.
meanings.sent4: The rents in the old blanket told stories of use and love.
meanings.sent5: The rents in the upholstery added character to the room.

meanings.definition: To tear or make a hole in something
meanings.sent1: Be careful not to rents your shirt on the nail.
meanings.sent2: He accidentally rents the paper while trying to fold it.
meanings.sent3: She playfully rents the wrapping paper while opening the gift.
meanings.sent4: The storm winds threatened to rents the roof of the house.
meanings.sent5: The cat loves to rents the curtains with its sharp claws.
